instructions.step-body: Create a plex account through plex.tv. There are also options sign up using your Google or Facebook account. You don't need to buy a Plex Pass or pay for anything.
Go to your profile and send either your username or email to me.
Wait for me to add you as a friend. You should receive an email, follow the directions in the email and accept the invitation.

You're all set you can watch movies through the web player at plex.tv or use your Xbox, Smart TV, etc. (iOS requires a one time $5 payment). Feel free to make requests for new content through Ombi, you can sign in using your plex username.
